ly.img.android.ui.widgets

Class AutoRotateImageSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • ly.img.android.ui.widgets.ImageSourceView
        • ly.img.android.ui.widgets.AutoRotateImageSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrientationSensor.OrientationListener

    public class AutoRotateImageSource
extends ImageSourceView
implements OrientationSensor.OrientationListener
    Rotate on device rotation it use the OrientationSensor Class. To use it the OrientationSensor must be start on Activity resume and stop on Activity pause.
